      • changePassword

        public static void changePassword(Connection c,
                  java.lang.String oldPwd,
                  java.lang.String newPwd)
                           throws Types.BadServerResponse,
                                  Types.XenAPIException,
                                  org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Change the account password; if your session is authenticated with root priviledges then the old_pwd is validated and the new_pwd is set regardless First published in XenServer 4.0.
        Parameters:
        oldPwd - Old password for account
        newPwd - New password for account
        Throws:
        Types.BadServerResponse
        Types.XenAPIException
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
